subject: feat: add multi-tag support to dashboard
body:
- Replace single type field with tags[] array model
- Add TAG_COLORS and tag helper functions (getCommitTags, getAllTags, getTagColor, getTagClass)
- Rename "Type" filter to "Tag" filter (matches any tag)
- Show all tags on commits (up to 3 with overflow indicator)
- Rename "By Type" tab to "By Tag" tab
- Update Progress tab Feature vs Bug Fix for tag-based counting
- Update combineDataFiles() to build tagBreakdown

Dashboard expects tags[] field - will show "other" until extraction is updated.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
